titles.title: USDA Express Loan Act
USDA Express Loan Act

To amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to create the USDA Express Guaranteed Farm Ownership and Guaranteed Farm Operating Loan programs, enabling faster access to credit for America's farmers and ranchers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities, Risk Management, and Credit.

committee.name: House Agriculture
committee.subcommittee: General Farm Commodities, Risk Management, and Credit
